TopicTitle: [0.90] AstroGamers DunaPlus! (0.1) - The Second in the series! -

Articles.Content:
Eve got it's [share!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/), so the other one to suffer the same fate has finally got [more!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) moons!

![JrqZtGq.png](http://i.imgur.com/JrqZtGq.png)

**What is DunaPlus, Mr AstroGamer?**

I'm [glad!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) you asked! DunaPlus is just like EvePlus! It adds [more!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) moons to Duna! They are both compatable with [*science*!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/), and one of them provides a small bit of a challenge.

**Sounds Interesting... can we see some pictures?**

Off course! What mod would it be without pictures?

![TAOSPt1.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/TAOSPt1.jpg)

![ePCNiIX.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/ePCNiIX.jpg)

![OYRZxlq.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/OYRZxlq.jpg)

Albums aren't [working!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) for some reason, so I have to do this. :S

**These moons** [**LOOK**!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) **cool, but are they** [**hard**!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) **to land on?**

Kinda. Mobos is basicly the Gilly of the [system!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/), but Kerfra has twice the gravity of the Mun, so be careful.

**This sounds decent! Where is the** [**download**!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)**?**

The [download!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) is right here! [Moderator removed defunct website link] It is on Kerbal Stuff to [download!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)! Be sure to [download!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) [KopernicusTech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109122-WIP-KopernicusTech-An-integration-attempt-between-Kopernicus-and-KittopiaTech-%28v0-13-03-26-15%29) as [well!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)!

**Thank you! Any last words or things you need to say? Cause this black text is boring me. Again.**

Really? Again?

And yes, there are a few things I want to say. 

1) If there are any bugs, you can [report!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) them, but I think there aren't really much.

2) This mod would not be [possible!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) without [KopernicusTech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109122-WIP-KopernicusTech-An-integration-attempt-between-Kopernicus-and-KittopiaTech-%28v0-13-03-26-15%29). KopernicusTech [allows!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) you to [make!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) planets. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

3) I got the textures from SpaceEngine.

And thank you [guys!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) for [viewing!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) the DunaPlus mod! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well, there is already a dwarf planet mod called "Trans-Keptunian". But textures is another problem.

SpaceEngine) Most of the time I find the similar textures all the time. I never find anything unique

Photoshop) I don't know how to make textures and plus, they get stretched out towards the top to keep the texture going to the poles. I don't know how to do that.
There's a sub forum where addon developers can get help with their mods. Ask there perhaps?

> 
> There's a sub forum where addon developers can get help with their mods. Ask there perhaps?

Hmm, maybe

Hey man! I'm developing an advanced Kerbol Plus mod based on squad's original plan ad my mod so far adds eat planet 2 with it's moons, the rocky planet that is huge with it's moons, mentioned by Nova Silisko many years ago, some Dev planets that remained unimplemented by the developers, 6 dwarf planets, and a second moon to Duna. Now I have some questions:

1. Will you add a config for my mod where you move all the moons farther out so people don't get the excessive "Ike Encounter" syndrome? 

2. Will you refine your textures without using Space Engine? I never used it. 

Here's some pro tips:

1. Start making your color maps out of colorized and highly modified hight maps. 

2. Create a normal map from the height using an online normal generator setting the opacity at 50 %. you'll find it pretty quickly.

3. Open the normal in an advanced picture editing program and turn it to greyscale. 

4. Open the greyscale normal in the same advanced program, copy your color map with MS paint and then paste it over to the normal map. Then choose transparency setting and click on Color to Alpha chanel in the layer settings. 

5. Your color map will now look much cooler. 

6. Profit! 

Cheers! I hope this helped a bit.
Ooooohhhh interesting. I'll have to check this out but so far you have my thumbs up and support

Thank you. So far the mod only consists of the gas giant with quite primitive textures and the Huge rocky planet. But expect a Huge update later this week or the next. Will include the dwarf planets and other things.

Now I have some questions:

>

>

To those wondering if it works for 1.0.4, I'm not working on the mod anymore, so sorry. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

For those wondering if it works for 1.1.2: I found a copy of this mod in a backup of my 0.90 directory, copied over GameData/DunaPlus, and it worked.  

The problem is, the only download location of this mod was KerbalStuff, and that website is dead and buried.

So, what are the possible options?

1. AstroGamer (who now goes under the forum name SnashingKirby148?) uploads the last release to Curse and/or Spacedock, as is, without any warrantees, use at your own risk.
2. AstroGamer gives permission to someone else to take over maintenance of the mod. I volunteer as a tribute, however, this mod lacks a license, and I will not do anything unless is has an Open Source license, one that actually permits me to take over the mod.

The same goes for the Eve+ mod.
